rdf:Description.dc:title: Tourism north : conference report, Peace River, December 5-7, 1984 1984 conference report, Peace River, December 5-7, 1984.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Tourism North Conference (1984 : Peace River, Alta.)
Weiss, Norm A.
Northern Alberta Development Council.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Peace River, Alta. : Northern Alberta Development Council,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Proceedings from a conference which brought together delegates from the tourism industry, government and northern communities to examine a community approach to the further development of tourism in northern Alberta.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Tourism
Tourism
